mainBoard.flavorText: Aboard her ship, the *Dragon's Smile*, Kari follows no one's rules but her own.

foreignData.flavorText: An Bord ihres Schiffes, der *Lächeln des Drachen*, folgt Kari nur ihren eigenen Regeln.
foreignData.name: Kari Zev, Freibeuterin der Lüfte
foreignData.text:
Erstschlag, Bedrohlich
Immer wenn Kari Zev, Freibeuterin der Lüfte, angreift, erzeuge Ragavan, einen legendären 2/1 roten Affe-Kreaturenspielstein. Ragavan kommt getappt und angreifend ins Spiel. Schicke ihn am Ende des Kampfes ins Exil.

foreignData.flavorText: A bordo de su nave, la Sonrisa del Dragón**, Kari solo sigue sus propias reglas.
foreignData.name: Kari Zev, pirata de aeronaves
foreignData.text:
Daña primero, amenaza.
Siempre que Kari Zev, pirata de aeronaves ataque, crea a Ragavan, una ficha de criatura legendaria Primate roja 2/1. Ragavan entra al campo de batalla girado y atacando. Exilia esa ficha al final del combate.

foreignData.flavorText: À bord de son navire, le *Sourire du dragon*, Kari n'obéit qu'à ses propres règles.
foreignData.name: Kari Zev, pillarde de vaisseau volant
foreignData.text:
Initiative, menace
À chaque fois que Kari Zev, pillarde de vaisseau volant attaque, créez Ragavan, un jeton de créature légendaire 2/1 rouge Singe. Ragavan arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé et attaquant. Exilez ce jeton à la fin du combat.

foreignData.flavorText: Sulla sua nave, la *Sorriso del Drago*, Kari non segue altre regole che le proprie.
foreignData.name: Kari Zev, Predona di Avionavi
foreignData.text:
Attacco improvviso, minacciare
Ogniqualvolta Kari Zev, Predona di Avionavi attacca, crea Ragavan, una pedina creatura leggendaria Scimmia 2/1 rossa. Ragavan entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato e attaccante. Esilia quella pedina alla fine del combattimento.

foreignData.flavorText: 自身の船である*ドラゴンの笑み*号の上では、カーリは自分以外誰の規則にも縛られない。
foreignData.name: 航空船を強襲する者、カーリ・ゼヴ
foreignData.text:
先制攻撃、威迫
航空船を強襲する者、カーリ・ゼヴが攻撃するたび、「ラガバン」という名前の赤の２/１の伝説の猿・クリーチャー・トークン１体を生成する。ラガバンはタップ状態かつ攻撃している状態で戦場に出る。戦闘終了時に、そのトークンを追放する。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 人間・海賊

foreignData.flavorText: 上了*龙笑号*飞船后，卡丽泽夫就只会遵守自己订下的规矩。
foreignData.name: 飞船大盗卡丽泽夫
foreignData.text:
先攻，威慑
每当飞船大盗卡丽泽夫攻击时，派出传奇衍生生物勒格文，其为2/1红色的猴。勒格文须横置进战场，且正进行攻击。在战斗结束时，放逐该衍生物。

mainBoard.name: Kari Zev, Skyship Raider
mainBoard.originalText:
First strike, menace
Whenever Kari Zev, Skyship Raider attacks, create Ragavan, a legendary 2/1 red Monkey creature token. Ragavan enters the battlefield tapped and attacking. Exile that token at end of combat.

rulings.text: Although Ragavan is attacking, it was never declared as an attacking creature (for the purposes of abilities that trigger whenever a creature attacks, for example).
The delayed triggered ability that exiles Ragavan triggers at end of combat even if Kari Zev is no longer on the battlefield.
You choose which opponent or opposing planeswalker Ragavan is attacking as you create the token. It doesn't have to be the same player or planeswalker Kari Zev is attacking.

mainBoard.name: Rigging Runner
mainBoard.originalText:
First strike
Raid — Rigging Runner enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked this turn.

rulings.text: Raid abilities care only that you attacked with a creature. It doesn’t matter how many creatures you attacked with, or which opponent or planeswalker controlled by an opponent those creatures attacked.

Raid abilities evaluate the entire turn to see if you attacked with a creature. That creature doesn’t have to still be on the battlefield. Similarly, the player or planeswalker it attacked doesn’t have to still be in the game or on the battlefield, respectively.

Raid — War-Name Aspirant enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked this turn.
War-Name Aspirant can't be blocked by creatures with power 1 or less.

rulings.text: Once a creature legally blocks War-Name Aspirant, changing that creature’s power to 1 or less won’t change or undo that block.

Raid abilities care only that you attacked with a creature. It doesn’t matter how many creatures you attacked with, or which opponent or planeswalker controlled by an opponent those creatures attacked.

Raid abilities evaluate the entire turn to see if you attacked with a creature. That creature doesn’t have to still be on the battlefield. Similarly, the player or planeswalker it attacked doesn’t have to still be in the game or on the battlefield, respectively.

mainBoard.text:
Raid — War-Name Aspirant enters with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked this turn.
War-Name Aspirant can't be blocked by creatures with power 1 or less.
